Constructor Detail

DDDDataSource

public DDDDataSource()
Constructor for a DDDDataSource object

Method Detail

setSource

public void setSource(byte[] src)
Sets the source byte array with data of a .ddd file. The byte array will be parsed and a TachographData object will be set up internally. The TachographData object can then be copied with the getTachographData() method.

Specified by:
setSource in interface DataSource
Parameters:
src - byte array with data of a .ddd file

processSource

public boolean processSource()

getTachographData

public TachographData getTachographData()
Returns the tachograph data.

Specified by:
getTachographData in interface DataSource
Returns:
TachographData with content of the DDD source

setSourceFile

public void setSourceFile(java.lang.String srcfile)
Sets the source .ddd file. The file will be parsed and a TachographData object will be set up internally. The TachographData object can then be copied with the getTachographData() method.

Parameters:
srcfile - the location of the .ddd file that will be processed

processSourceFile

public boolean processSourceFile()
